title: Handle Complaint About Staff Member
description: A guest reports that an usher was rude to them.

tasks.description: Apologize to the guest and get the details of the incident, including the location and a description of the usher.
Log the complaint in the incident management system.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates a new incident report.

tasks.description: Forward the report to the supervisor in charge of the ushers for investigation and follow-up.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent assigns the incident to the appropriate manager.

tasks.description: Offer the guest a gesture of goodwill, such as a voucher for a free soda.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent offers a service recovery gesture.
